# starknet_getBlockWithTxHashes

## Metadata

- name: starknet_getBlockWithTxHashes
- prefix: starknet
- state: ⚠️
- [specification]()
- [issue]()

## Specification Description

Get block information with transaction hashes given the block id.

### Parameters

- None

### Returns

- None

## Beerus Logic

There is no Beerus logic.

### Starknet methods

- [starknet_getBlockWithTxHashes](https://github.com/starkware-libs/starknet-specs/blob/e0b76ed0d8d8eba405e182371f9edac8b2bcbc5a/api/starknet_api_openrpc.json#L11)

Example call:

```json
{
  "jsonrpc":"2.0",
  "method":"starknet_getBlockWithTxHashes",
  "params":["tag", "latest"],
  "id":1
}
```

Example responses:

```json
{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
```
